name: MKCircle
desc: A circular overlay with a configurable radius that you center on a geographic coordinate.

items.name: init(center: CLLocationCoordinate2D, radius: CLLocationDistance)
items.desc: Creates and returns a circle object using the specified coordinate and radius.

items.name: init(mapRect: MKMapRect)
items.desc: Creates and returns a circle object where the circular area is derived from the specified rectangle.

items.name: var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The center point of the circular area, specified as a latitude and longitude.

items.name: var radius: CLLocationDistance
items.desc: The radius of the circular area, measured in meters.

items.name: var boundingMapRect: MKMapRect
items.desc: The bounding rectangle of the circular area.
